entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
